data.text: Dimaadua ga helekai mai,
“Duu gi nua, hanadu gi baahi di hale o tangada hai pileedi, gei Au ga haga modongoohia adu gi di goe agu helekai.”
Malaa, au gaa hana gi golo, ga gidee au tangada hai pileedi dela e ngalua i lodo dono gowaa ngalua.
Nia madagoaa huogodoo di pileedi ma ga hai gee, gei mee gaa hai dana huai mee gi nia gelegele pigi aalaa, gii hai be dana hiihai.
Dimaadua ga helekai mai,

“E hai behee, Au e deemee dagu hai adu gi goodou go digau Israel, gadoo be di hai dela ne hai go tangada hai pileedi deenaa ang gi nia hagamunga gelegele? Goodou e daahi ko Au i lodo ogu lima, gadoo be di hagamunga gelegele dela e daahi i lodo nia lima o tangada hai mee deenaa.
Tei madagoaa gei Au ga helekai bolo Au ga hagabagi gi daha mo di oho gi lala, be e hagahuaidu dahi henua be di guongo o di king,
gei ogo tenua deelaa gaa huli gi daha mo ono huaidu, gei Au ga hagalee hai di maa be dagu helekai ne hai.
Maa Au ga helekai bolo Au gaa dogi be e haga duu aga dahi henua be di guongo o di king,
gei di guongo deelaa ga hagalee hagalongo mai gi di Au, ga haihai hua di huaidu, malaa, gei Au ga hagalee hai di maa be dagu helekai ne hai.

Malaa dolomeenei, gei goe ga hagi anga gi digau Judah mo digau Jerusalem dagu hai dela gu hagababa bolo Au ga hai baahi gi digaula, mo dagu hai dela gu hagatogomaalia bolo e hagaduadua digaula. Hai gi digaula bolo gii huli gi daha mo nadau mouli huaidu, gi huluhia nadau hangahaihai mo nadau hai milimilia ala e hai.

Gei ogo digaula ga helekai adu, ‘Ma deeai! Dono hadinga aha mai gi gimaadou? Gimaadou e hai hua go madau hiihai be gimaadou e lodo hamaaloo be e hai go madau hangaahai huaidu ala e hiihai ginai gimaadou.’”
Dimaadua ga helekai, “Goodou heeu ina malaa gi nia guongo huogodoo ala i golo be maa iai di mee gu gila aga beenei i mua. Digau Israel guu hai di nadau ihala damana!
Nia ‘snow’ le e mee di odi ia gi daha mo tomo nia Gonduu o Lebanon? Nia dama monowai ala i mehanga nia Gonduu o Lebanon le e mee di maangoo? Deeai loo!

Gei ogo agu daangada gu de langahia e ginaadou Au. Digaula guu dudu nadau ‘incense’ ang gi nia balu ieidu bolo e hai ai nadau tigidaumaha. Digaula gu tingatinga hua i hongo di ala dela belee hula ai ginaadou. Digaula gu hagalee hula i hongo nia ala mai anadilaangi, e heehee hua i hongo nia ala digi modongoohia.

Digaula guu hai tenua deenei e haga ingoo bolo di guongo hagalliga dangada gaa hana hua beelaa. Nia daangada huogodoo ala ma ga hula laalaa gi di guongo deenei, le e homouli nadau lodo, gei e goboina huoloo e ginaadou gi di nadau mee dela guu mmada ginai.

Gei Au gaa hai agu daangada gi lellele dagidahi i mua nadau hagadaumee, gadoo be nia gohu dogolia ne ili go di madangi o dua. Au gaa huli gi daha ga hagalee hagamaamaa digaula i lodo nadau haingadaa.”

Nia daangada ga helekai i nadau mehanga, “Gidaadou gaa hai tadau hai gi Jeremiah! Ma iai digau hai mee dabu i nia madagoaa huogodoo ga agoago mai laa gi gidaadou, ge iai digau kabemee labelaa i golo ga haga modongoohia mai gi gidaadou, mo nia soukohp labelaa i golo, ga hagadele mai labelaa gi gidaadou nnelekai a God. Gidaadou ga hai baahi ang gi Jeremiah ga hagalee hagalongo gi nnelekai a maa.”
Gei au ga dalodalo gaa hai, “Meenei Dimaadua, Goe gi hagalongo mai gi agu helekai mo nnelekai o ogu hagadaumee ala e hai.

E hai behee? Di huaidu la go di hui o nia hangahaihai humalia? Digaula guu geli di nadau luwa bolo gii doo au gi no lodo, gei Goe gi langahia dogu hanimoi gi doo baahi idimaa i digaula, mo di dangidangi hagamahi bolo Goe gi hudee hagaduadua ina digaula i lodo do hagawelewele.

Malaa, dolomeenei, meenei Dimaadua, Goe gi dugua ang gi nadau dama gii mmade i lodo tau magamaga, gei gi dugua ang gi ginaadou gii mmade i lodo tauwa. Nia ahina gii noho deai nadau lodo mo nadau dama ai. Nia daane gii mmade i lodo nia magi, mo nia dama daane gii mmade i lodo tauwa.

Goe hagau ina mai gi digaula di buini dauwa huaidu, bolo gi limalima gi ohaa nadau hale gi kae ina nadau goloo, gi mmaadagu digaula gi wwolowwolo! Idimaa, digaula guu geli di nadau luwa bolo gii doo au gi no lodo, gei guu hai di nadau hele belee kumi au.

Malaa, meenei Dimaadua, Goe gu iloo nadau hai ala bolo e daaligi au gii made. Goe hudee dumaalia anga nadau haihai huaidu be e dumaalia ang gi ginaadou nadau haihai huaidu. Goe gi kilia digaula gi lala, haga magedaa digaula, ge e hagahuaidu digaula i lodo do madagoaa hagawelewele.”
